mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : insertEmail */ INSERT INTO rpc_cmm_email (email_id, seq, sender, reciver, cc, bcc, subject, contents, attached_document_id_1, attached_document_id_2, attached_document_id_3, attached_document_id_4, attached_document_id_5, attached_file_id_1, attached_file_id_2, attached_file_id_3, attached_file_id_4, attached_file_id_5, send_datetime, create_datetime, creator) VALUES (#{emailId}, #{seq}, #{sender}, #{reciver}, #{cc}, #{bcc}, #{subject}, #{contents}, #{attachedDocumentId1}, #{attachedDocumentId2}, #{attachedDocumentId3}, #{attachedDocumentId4}, #{attachedDocumentId5}, #{attachedFileId1}, #{attachedFileId2}, #{attachedFileId3}, #{attachedFileId4}, #{attachedFileId5}, #{sendDatetime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{creator})
mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getNextEmailId */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(email_id) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(email_id) + 1) END nextEmailId FROM rpc_cmm_email
/* QUERY ID : getNextEmailSequence */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(seq) + 1) END nextSeq FROM rpc_cmm_email WHERE email_id = #{emailId}
/* QUERY ID : getBelongingEmailCnt */ SELECT count(*) belongingEmailCnt FROM rpc_cmm_email WHERE email_id = #{emailId}

/* QUERY ID : getEmailList */ SELECT a.email_id 'emailId', a.seq 'seq', a.sender 'sender', a.reciver 'reciver', a.cc 'cc', a.bcc 'bcc', a.subject 'subject', a.contents 'contents', a.attached_document_id_1 'attachedDocumentId1', a.attached_document_id_2 'attachedDocumentId2', a.attached_document_id_3 'attachedDocumentId3', a.attached_document_id_4 'attachedDocumentId4', a.attached_document_id_5 'attachedDocumentId5', a.attached_file_id_1 'attachedFileId1', a.attached_file_id_2 'attachedFileId2', a.attached_file_id_3 'attachedFileId3', a.attached_file_id_4 'attachedFileId4', a.attached_file_id_5 'attachedFileId5', DATE_FORMAT(a.send_datetime, '%d/%m/%Y') 'sendDatetime', a.result_code 'resultCode', a.result_message 'resultMessage', a.create_datetime 'createDatetime', DATE_FORMAT(a.create_datetime, '%d/%m/%Y') 'createDatetime', a.creator 'creator' FROM rpc_cmm_email a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.email_id = #{emailId} AND a.seq = #{seq} AND UPPER(a.sender) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{sender}), '%') AND UPPER(a.reciver) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{reciver}), '%') AND UPPER(a.cc) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{cc}), '%') AND UPPER(a.bcc) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{bcc}), '%') AND UPPER(a.subject) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{subject}), '%') AND UPPER(a.contents) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{contents}), '%') AND a.result_code = #{resultCode} AND a.result_message = #{resultMessage} AND a.creator = #{creator} ORDER BY a.seq DESC
mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : insertEmailAttachedFile */ INSERT INTO rpc_cmm_email_attached_file (file_id, original_filename, saved_filename, file_type, file_size, file_description, create_datetime, creator) VALUES (#{fileId}, #{originalFilename}, #{savedFilename}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileDescription}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{creator})
mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getNextEmailAttachedFileId */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(file_id) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(file_id) + 1) END nextFileId FROM rpc_cmm_email_attached_file

/* QUERY ID : getEmailAttachedFileList */ SELECT a.file_id 'fileId', a.saved_filename 'savedFilename', a.original_filename 'originalFilename', a.file_type 'fileType', a.file_size 'fileSize', a.file_description 'fileDescription', a.create_datetime 'createDatetime', a.creator 'creator' FROM rpc_cmm_email_attached_file a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.file_id = #{fileId} AND UPPER(a.saved_filename) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{savedFilename}), '%') AND UPPER(a.original_filename) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{originalFilename}), '%') AND a.file_type = #{fileType} AND UPPER(a.file_description) like CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{fileDescription}), '%') AND a.creator = #{creator} ORDER BY a.file_id ASC
